subject: Apology
msgSnippet: Regular readers: I apologize for littering this group with my arguments with individuals. Please continue asking questions and answers will be forthcoming. I
messageBody:
Regular readers:

I apologize for littering this group with my arguments with individuals.
Please continue asking questions and answers will be forthcoming. I am taking
a break from answering them, until this nonsense dies out.

Thanks.

--
J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
Let's write software that people understand.
http://www.diasparsoftware.com/
telephone: +1 416 791-8603
